meaningMnemonic: The credible <kanji>resources</kanji> that determine your professional <kanji>status</kanji> are your <vocabulary>qualifications</vocabulary>. You need some good ones if you want to get into a good school or land a sweet job.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
